name: Onyphe_Search
author: Pierre Baudry, Adrien Barchapt, Andrea Garavaglia, Davide Arcuri, James Atack
description: Retrieve results from ONYPHE Search API for a given ip, domain or fqdn from specified category

configurationItems.name: key
configurationItems.description: Define the API key to use to connect the service

configurationItems.name: category
configurationItems.description: Specify ONYPHE category to be used for search API (default datascan)

configurationItems.name: auto_import
configurationItems.description: Automatically import artifacts as observables (risks, cves, assets, ...)
